title: Orange cake with orange butter icing
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '300g caster sugar', '125ml milk', '125ml orange juice', '125ml vegetable oil', '3 eggs, beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoons grated orange zest', 'Orange butter icing', '6 tablespoons butter, softened', '250g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon grated orange zest']
